channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2025010605
item.description:
Report X-2025010605

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-03
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment was discovered leaking during sort operations. 1 UN4G Box containing 4 metal cans @ 4 Liters each. 1 metal can was leaking from the top/cap. All contents were placed in a salvage drum and held for disposition from the shipper.

item.title: Report X-2025010412
item.description:

  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Undeclared hazmat found during screening. Other undeclared hazmat found with no release as follows. (Replicating questions 14-29) Perfumery products with flammable solvents //haz class 3 // UN 1266//not shipped as hazardous waste//not toxic by inhalation//not shipped under Exemption, Approval, or CA number//shipment was undeclared with no release//packaging type non-bulk/outer packaging plastic box//

item.title: Report X-2025010413
item.description:
Report X-2025010413

  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During x-ray screening, aerosols were visible in the top of one box. Targeted physical search performed, resulting in discovery of 2 small inner boxes, each containing 2 aerosols. 4 aerosol cans x 124.7 grams.

  • Description: RSA was pulling shipments to load into carts and set up for Adak flight. There were three clear totes and in one of them he noticed there were Febreeze air freshener aerosols. In total three x 2-pack aerosol sprays.
